_header: Mother of life o cause of all our wealth
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary by Hoccleve — fifteen 8-line stanzas

HunHM111.First Lines:
Modir of lyf o cause of al our weltheFyndere of grace and of our
                    medecyne…
HunHM111.Last Lines:
…And fully stande in youre affeccionOr my body be clothid in
                    his graue
